comments.body: @zhidongqu-db For consistency with Run Tags and Experiment Tags, this Python entity representation of MV tags should be a dictionary of key:value pairs, rather than a list. See https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/mlflow/entities/run_data.py#L42

Cannot use `@experimental` annotation for classes since python 2 does not allow `__doc__` attributed to be edited.

```
AttributeError: attribute '__doc__' of 'type' objects is not writable
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@class ModelVersion(_ModelRegistryEntity):
    """
    Note:: Experimental: This entity may change or be removed in a future release without warning.
    MLflow entity for Model Version.
    A model version is uniquely identified using underlying
